mapper.select: SELECT A.i_comment, A.i_shop, A.comment_ctnt, A.score, A.i_user, A.r_dt, A.m_dt, B.nm, B.profile_img FROM t_comment A JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_shop = #{i_shop} ORDER BY A.i_comment DESC
SELECT A.i_comment, A.i_shop, A.comment_ctnt, A.score, A.i_user, A.r_dt, A.m_dt, B.nm, B.profile_img FROM t_comment A JOIN t_user B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_comment = #{i_comment}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment (i_shop, comment_ctnt, score, i_user) VALUES (#{i_shop}, #{comment_ctnt}, #{score}, #{i_user})
